title: Episode 198: Teal Swan: Spiritual Influencer or Modern Day Cult Leader? - Part 2
description:
Listener note: This episode contains discussions of alleged child sexual abuse and suicide.
Having escaped a harrowing situation, Teal Bosworth took shelter with a newfound love. Together, they began harnessing her spiritual gifts - putting on workshops, providing therapy sessions, and churning out Teal’s teachings to the masses. But it seemed the more people she reached, the more were being harmed. 

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
